name: MonoPlatformer
description:
It was meant to be really short and I wanted to focus on visuals mostly, it's based off of Celeste, Terraria, and a little bit of Pico8 style. The goal is to get to the highest platform in the middle. 

I unfortunately do not know how to port to Mac yet but i'm leaving all of the project files if somebody who uses godot knows how to then you could manually do it yourself. Sorry about that... But if you do know I would greatly appreciate it if you would leave a comment down here or hmu in discord GudBoiNero#6650 ( Make sure to mention you're coming from the itch page otherwise I may not respond because I may think you're a bot )

Controls:

  • A and D ( Left and Right )
  • Space ( Jump, hold to go higher )
  • Esc ( Restart )

There is no sfx or music, because I don't know how to do that yet. There are three versions currently.

v0.1, v0.1.2, and v0.1.3

v0.1.2 is impossible to beat due to the velocity of the wind pushing against too much
